pageContext.claim: “Raphael Warnock has openly declared his support for socialism, and he has even praised Marxists all over the world.  He once hosted the barbaric communist dictator, Fidel Castro.”
pageContext.analysis: This is misleading. "In 1995, Fidel Castro was invited to speak before the congregation at the Abyssinian Baptist Church in New York where Warnock was a youth pastor at the time, according to the Warnock campaign. However, Warnock insists he had no role in the decision to invite Castro," CNN reported. "Responding to Loeffler's allegations in the debate Warnock said, 'I never met him, I never invited him. He has nothing to do with me.'"
